title: bitcoinore.com
author: bitcoinore.com
content: Hi there,We are looking for an Experienced Bitcoin / LN developer to join our team. We are building a service that utilizes bitcoin and looking for someone with extensive tech experience to join our team.The Role would require the individual to own the integration layer, allowing us to utilize Bitcoin and LN.Experience building projects on top of Bitcoin or LNExperience working in teamsExperience building services/applications from the ground upMust be fluent in English, both written and spokenUS/CA/EU CitizenEST TimezoneCompensation comes in the form of 5% equity, vested over one year.About us:Team of 5 Engineers, 1 Designer, 1 Lawyer.The project is eight months old.MVP Planned for Jan 2nd, 2023We have a 3-year roadmap, multiple iterations, and many more releases.Expectation:Help lead and own all things related to Bitcoin / LN integration and adoptionMentor and guide other engineers to understand and help contribute to the developmentPeer Review code/decisions related to Bitcoin/LN layers
